alert.note: Alert for Jasper (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 03 at 4:55PM EDT until August 03 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR JASPER COUNTY... At 355 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Knox to near Rensselaer, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Rensselaer, Remington, Hanging Grove, Collegeville, Baileys Corner and Parr. Including the following interstate... Indiana I-65 between mile markers 200 and 219, and between mile markers 221 and 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
